attributes.action: PLEASE SAVE HARROW RUGBY AND OTHER SPORTS CLUBS FROM GREED.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Harrow council is hitting us with new excesive costs, which means they will shut us down. If they get away with this, other councils will follow.
They are targeting all the sports clubs that saved up and built a clubhouse on their grounds, and then through some clause in the landlord/tenants act, they claim the right to charge a huge rent on the clubhouse. This puts so much finantial strain on the clubs, they are forced to close down. We need to club together to stop this, it is already too late for several bowling clubs in Harrow; it could be your clubs next!

rejection.details: Please address the excessive use of capital letters; they make your petition hard to read.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
